description: This creamy and delicious feta and lentil traybake is perfect served with crusty bread for scooping.
keywords: Baked Feta with Lentils & Cherry Tomatoes
name: Baked Feta with Lentils & Cherry Tomatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Roast for 30 minutes until the tomatoes are soft and the feta is a little golden on the edges. Serve with the rest of the parsley and basil scattered on top, and extra olive oil if desired.
